concept.title: Running XSD2SVG from the command line
concept.shortdesc: How to run XSD2SVG from the command line.

section.p: In the bin directory there is a shell script called xsd2svg.sh. This takes two arguments the first argument is the XSD to process, the second argument is the output folder. There is a an optional third argument, which is the root node. This allows for sections of the schema selected rather than the whole schema.

example.title: Example of using xsd2svg.sh from the command line
